summary: Joycat - Joycat first appeared in 2015, gaining popularity as a viral image of a smiling cat that quickly became a symbol of joy and positivity. Initially spreading across social media platforms, it evolved into a beloved reaction meme, embodying happiness and contentment in online communities. By the late 2010s, Joycat had cemented its place in internet culture, celebrated for its ability to uplift and bring smiles to people around the world.
